mapper.insert: insert into g_goods_brand (BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME, CATEGORY_ID, BRAND_LOGO, SITE_URL, SORT_ORL, IS_SHOW, BRAND_DESC) values (#{brandId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortOrl,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isShow,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{brandDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update g_goods_brand set BRAND_NAME = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BRAND_LOGO = #{brandLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SITE_URL = #{siteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT_ORL = #{sortOrl,jdbcType=TINYINT}, IS_SHOW = #{isShow,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BRAND_DESC = #{brandDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME, CATEGORY_ID, BRAND_LOGO, SITE_URL, SORT_ORL, IS_SHOW, BRAND_DESC from g_goods_brand where BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
select BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME, CATEGORY_ID, BRAND_LOGO, SITE_URL, SORT_ORL, IS_SHOW, BRAND_DESC from g_goods_brand
